long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing AngelVPN for Chrome – the ultimate solution for anyone who values online security, privacy, and freedom.
With AngelVPN's Chrome extension, you can enjoy the internet without worrying about any online threats, censorship, or restrictions. Let's look at the unbeatable features that make AngelVPN the best VPN extension for Chrome.

7-Day Free Trial: Now, you can try AngelVPN's premium features absolutely free for 7 days. To take on this you need to activate the trial from the iOS and Android app.

Why do you need AngelVPN’s VPN proxy extension for Chrome?

✓ Access geo-restricted content
If you’re someone who always finds ‘This content is not available in your country’ a total bummer, then you definitely need AngelVPN’s VPN Chrome extension to help you surpass those restrictions and enjoy content from anywhere in the world.

✓ Browse anonymously on the internet
It’s frustrating to know that internet service providers, governments, website owners, and many different entities keep track of your data when you’re browsing the internet. If you want to browse the internet with complete anonymity, then AngelVPN’s VPN Chrome extension is just what you need.

✓ Unblock websites and social media
If you’re someone who frequently encounters restrictions by the authorities while accessing social media or news sites, AngelVPN’s VPN Chrome extension is just going to help you bypass those restrictions.

✓ Encrypt internet traffic
Accessing the internet with complete freedom and anonymity is fun, but if you’re someone who wants to be secure on top of everything else, then AngelVPN’s VPN Chrome extension is just the right choice for you.

What features does AngelVPN’s VPN proxy extension offer?

✓ Complete Security
AngelVPN's military-grade 256-bit encryption ensures that all your online activities are kept private and secure from cyber threats, hackers, and snoops. With AngelVPN, you can browse the internet with complete peace of mind, knowing that your data is always protected.

✓ Unlimited Bandwidth
AngelVPN offers unlimited bandwidth, so you can stream, download, and browse as much as you want without restrictions or limitations. No more worrying about running out of data or hitting a cap – with AngelVPN, you can use the internet as much as you like.

✓ No Ads
Say goodbye to annoying ads and pop-ups that distract you from your online activities. You can enjoy a clean and ad-free browsing experience with AngelVPN's Chrome extension.

✓ Certified No-Log Infrastructure
AngelVPN ensures that your online activities are not monitored or tracked, keeping your privacy intact. Our certified no-log infrastructure guarantees that your data is never stored, shared, or sold to third parties.

✓ 24/7 Customer Support
AngelVPN's dedicated customer support team is available round the clock to assist you with any issue. Whether you have a technical question or need help with your account, our friendly and knowledgeable support team is always here to help.

✓ Locations worldwide
AngelVPN’s VPN Chrome extension has more than 96 locations for you to connect from. We have a VPN for the US, UK, Australia, Canada, Singapore, Germany, India, and almost all other countries Chrome. Simply connect to your desired country from the AngelVPN proxy extension with just a click.

✓ 6500 optimized VPN servers
We have a 3500 server network, optimized for fast VPN speeds in all the regions. Just pick your desired location and let us assign you the best server. You can also choose to pick a server for your desired location yourself.

✓ WebRTC Leak Protection
AngelVPN's WebRTC leak protection ensures that your real IP address is not exposed, preventing potential leaks that could compromise your privacy.

✓ Spoof GPS Location
If you’re surfing the internet without a VPN, then you’re putting yourself at a huge risk. Our Spoof GPS Location feature enables you to manipulate your GPS location from internet service providers, governments, website owners, and many different entities. This feature protects you from prying eyes, helps you get off the radar and guarantees your online security.

✓ Bypass Proxy
With AngelVPN, you can easily bypass proxy restrictions and access any content you want, no matter where you are. AngelVPN covers you whether you want to access blocked websites or streaming services.

But that's not all! AngelVPN offers a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try the service risk-free. Moreover, our smart purpose selection feature allows you to connect to the best server for your specific needs, whether streaming, downloading, or browsing. With access to 1000+ servers in 100+ locations, you can connect to as many servers as you like without limitations. VPN apps for Windows, MacOS, iPhone, Android, Android TV, and Amazon Firestick TV.

AngelVPN's extension for Chrome is easy to use and perfect for all internet users, even those who may not be tech-savvy. With AngelVPN, you can experience the internet like never before. AngelVPN covers you whether you want to unblock sites or stream your favorite content. Choose AngelVPN for Chrome, and take control of your online experience today! Multi-login on up to 10 devices.

How to enable the VPN extension in Chrome?
Setting up an AngelVPN VPN proxy extension is just so easy. It requires only 4 quick steps.
1. Add the AngelVPN extension to your Chrome browser by clicking the ‘Add to Chrome’ button.
2. Get a AngelVPN subscription.
3. Login to your AngelVPN account.
4. Select your country, and you’re connected to a VPN.
